title: Choral Voices
description: A collection of music that feature choral voices. This music is beautiful and lush, evoking ancient cathedrals and setting a somber mood with a AAA production level.
longDescription:
A collection of music that feature choral voices. This music is beautiful and lush, evoking ancient cathedrals and setting a somber mood with a AAA production level.


Preview the music here!
